multiple_choice.question_en: Which of the following is an advantage of multithreading?
multiple_choice.question_ar: أي مما يلي يُعد ميزة لتعدد الخيوط (Multithreading)؟

choices.text_en: a) Better resource utilization by sharing resources among multiple threads

choices.marked_text_en: ✔ a) Better resource utilization by sharing resources among multiple threads

choices.text_en: b) Increased memory requirements for each thread

choices.marked_text_ar: ب) زيادة متطلبات الذاكرة لكل خيط.

choices.marked_text_ar: ج) تعقيد أقل في جدولة العمليات.

choices.text_en: d) Slower execution due to thread synchronization

answer.answer_en: a) Better resource utilization by sharing resources among multiple threads
answer.answer_ar: أ) استغلال أفضل للموارد عبر مشاركة الموارد بين الخيوط.

multiple_choice.question_en: Which of the following is true about "parallelism" in multithreading?

choices.marked_text_en: ✔ a) It refers to executing multiple threads concurrently on multiple processors
choices.marked_text_ar: ✔ أ) يعني تنفيذ خيوط متعددة بالتزامن على معالجات/أنوية متعددة.

choices.text_en: b) It is the same as concurrency
choices.marked_text_en: b) It is the same as concurrency

choices.text_en: c) It is limited to single-core processors

choices.marked_text_ar: ج) يقتصر على المعالجات أحادية النواة.
